verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Revive Thy work O Lord While here to Thee we bow Descend O gracious Lord descend Oh come and bless us now{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Revive Thy work O Lord Now to Thy saints appear Oh speak with power to ev'ry soul And let Thy people hear{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Revive Thy work O Lord And every soul inspire Oh kindle in each heart we pray The Pentecostal fire{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Revive Thy work O Lord Exalt Thy precious name And may Thy love in every heart Be kindled to a flame{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Revive Thy work O Lord And bless to all Thy Word And may its pure and sacred truth In living faith be heard{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Revive Thy work O Lord And make Thy servants bold Convict of sin and work once more As in the days of old{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Revive Thy work O Lord Give Pentecostal showers Be Thine the glory - Thine alone The blessing Lord be ours{/lang-eng}
